Basic
LifeRise is an AI-enhanced coaching program built for ultra-rapid personal development using dynamic systems in one-on-one and group environments.
Purpose
Evolve.
Supercharge your personal evolution with the collective wisdom of humanity at your fingertips and the power of AI. Weâ€™re here to help you learn how to harness your budding omniscience.
Coalesce.
Converge with other noonauts exploring tech-enabled, ultra-rapid personal development. We help you connect. Welcome to the hivemind.
Transcend.
Decouple your knowledge from your mind. Delimit your time from your experience. We help you optimize your expansion with the power of machine.
Bio
Who is behind it?
Cas Proffitt. Cas is a disruption expert and coach that has worked with Fortune 500 / Fortune 100 / Fortune 50 companies on cutting-edge initiatives as well as some of the most advanced governments in the world.
Role
To be a helpful companion in your personal evolution and to connect you with the others.
